QuestData.Title: Reading the Bones
QuestData.Description: One of the benefits of possessing this creature is that I have access to all of her powers. As a bone witch and rune reader, she has the power to throw the bones and determine one's fate.$B$B<The Bone Witch smirks.>$B$BLucky for you and I that I have it within my power to influence those readings.$B$BBring me the bones of the vrykul that you kill here in Jotunheim and I will toss them to allow you to determine your own fate.
QuestData.LogDescription: The Bone Witch in Njorndar Village has instructed you to collect 15 Vrykul Bones.
QuestData.CompletionText: I find it remarkable that these beings ever held sway over the world when they utilized such primitive magic.
QuestData.RewardText: And now we shall see what the future holds for you.$B$B<The Bone Witch casts the bones upon the rug in front of her.>$B$BChoose your fate, $c.
